resources.string:
Steps to use this app: 
 1. Pair your band with the phone
 2. Make sure Microsoft Health is installed
 3. The Text box below takes in the interval of time of which the application will store data in seconds.
 4. REMEMBER to select the right label. 5. Press the Start button
 6. Data from the band should be displayed.
Are you sure you want to delete all data from the database?

The MS band data collector was developed to store values from the band\'s sensors at different sampling rates. The following sensors are utilized to collect data from the band: the accelerometer, the gyroscope, the heart monitor and the skin temperature monitor. The stored values can be exported to a csv file saved locally on the mobile device for further processing.
